name: Sushi Surf - Endless Run Fun
description:
Surf, fish and make sushi! New awesome endless-runner fun. Help Kirashi and Miyu surf amazing sea and under-water landscapes. While you surf, catch unusual fish and complete missions for Grandma Hinata to prepare the most delicious sushi. Collect coins on sunken pirate ships and under-water volcanoes. Watch out for dangerous fish and the rocky sea!




- CARVE the perfect wave with simple one-touch control
- CATCH the freshest ingredients for delicious sushi
- COMPLETE missions to increase your score multiplier and receive other exciting rewards
- BRAVE the choppy sea with the coolest boards
- DODGE rocks and evil fish
- COLLECT and earn coins with crazy stunts
- UNLOCK some outstanding gear and insane outfits
- REACH a top spot on the Sushi Surf leaderboard of champions
- USE fish magnets or exciting boosters to improve your run
- ENJOY amazing graphics in wonderful organic environments




No one makes sushi like Grandma. She needs your help. Only the best surfers can ride dangerous waves AND catch the freshest fish for her sushi. As a reward you’ll earn coins, new gear and boosters for even more exciting rides.




Join the best surf fun and DOWNLOAD the game now!




Questions about the game? Ask our support team: support@awfullynicestudios.com
